alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:50PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Las Animas County through 530 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northwest of Kim, or 40 miles south of North La Junta, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Las Animas County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
